name: incomparably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is so good or great that nothing or no one else could achieve the same standard: His second novel was incomparably better than his first. He is an incomparably gifted athlete. See
incomparable
More examplesFewer examplesThe tunnel has proved incomparably more expensive than at first imagined. The beaches here are incomparably beautiful.Today’s computers are incomparably more powerful than those from 15 years ago.
